job_title: Machine Learning Research Scientist - Personalization Science, Apple Fitness+
job_description:
• Minimum QualificationsDeep knowledge of machine learning-powered personalization algorithms, design patterns, and tools.
• Practical real-world experience with building scalable recommendation systems.
• Strong written & oral communication skills.
• In particular, this includes deep learning, reinforcement learning, and unsupervised learning methods.
• Proven grasp of the open-source Python ML/AI tech stack, including Tensorflow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, numpy, scipy, and pandas.
• Technical competence in production-quality software development.
• Familiarity with big data technologies.
• MS in a quantitative field, including Computer Science, Maths, Statistics, Physics, etc.

• Join our 30,000 everyday heroes.
• A global technology and professional services company that delivers consulting, technology and mission services to every major agency across the U.
• Government, defense and intelligence community.
• Our 30,000 experts extract the power of technology to create immediate value and deliver solutions at the edge of innovation.
• We operate across 30 countries worldwide, offering leading capabilities in digital modernization, AI/ML, Cloud, Cyber and application development.
• Together with our clients, we strive to create a safer, smarter world by harnessing the power of deep expertise and advanced technology.
